graph.original_query: Create a stunning dark-themed one-page landing website for a doctor or clinic using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS + Animate.css + Splide.js (via CDN, no build tools), with a modern black/charcoal background, vibrant neon accents (blue/purple), glowing UI, smooth scroll, subtle animations, and sliders; include: sticky header with anchors, fullscreen hero (picsum.photos/1600/900), animated feature highlights (use picsum.photos/400/300), testimonial slider, glowing CTA section, animated counters (patients, years, etc), About section with mission, animated timeline and team cards, Services with 6–8 product/service cards (image, title, short text, price, filter buttons), a Contact section (name/email/message form, location/map card, phone/email), elegant footer with icons and links; ensure responsive layout, immersive design, elegant spacing, no lorem ipsum, real content, high-contrast dark mode, and use only HTML/CSS/JS in a single file with proper meta and title; call CoderAgent at least 9–10 times to build this in parts, updating same HTML file each time with precise context.

T001.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to create a basic HTML file with meta tags, title, and CDN links for Flowbite, Tailwind CSS, Animate.css, and Splide.js. I also need to add a basic dark-themed CSS to set the black/charcoal background. The structure should include a body with a basic structure.

files.index.html:
Clinic

Welcome

© 2024 Clinic. All rights reserved.

T002.initial_thoughts: Alright, I need to update the existing HTML file (`index.html`) to include a sticky header with navigation anchors, neon accents, and smooth scrolling. The key here is to modify the existing header to include navigation links and add a JavaScript function for smooth scrolling. I'll inject this into the existing HTML structure. The challenge is ensuring that the modifications integrate seamlessly with the existing Tailwind CSS classes and the overall dark theme.

nodes.description: Ensure the website is responsive and has an immersive dark mode design with elegant spacing.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure from the previous step, ensure the website is responsive across different devices and has an immersive dark mode design with elegant spacing. The HTML code from the previous agent is as follows: {{T011.output}}

output.initial_thoughts: Okay, I have the HTML structure from the previous step and need to enhance it for responsiveness and implement a better dark mode design. I'll use Tailwind CSS to ensure the layout is responsive across different devices. I'll also refine the spacing and ensure the design is immersive with the dark theme. I will modify the existing index.html file directly. Responsiveness will be achieved using Tailwind's responsive modifiers (e.g., `md:`, `lg:`, `xl:`), and spacing will be adjusted using padding and margin utilities.

nodes.agent_prompt: Distill the code from the website created. The HTML code from the previous agent is as follows: {{T012.output}}

code_profile.purpose: Dark-themed one-page landing website for a clinic, utilizing Tailwind CSS, Animate.css, Flowbite, and Splide.js for a modern and responsive design.
key_features: Neon text and glowing UI elements
